snippet: Thousands of patients in New Hampshire are being tested after a medical technician, who had worked in eight states since 2007, is linked to syringes left unattended on carts.
abstract: Thousands of patients in New Hampshire are being tested for hepatitis C in the wake of an outbreak linked to medical technician David Kwiatowski.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of patients in New Hampshire are being tested after a medical technician, who had worked in eight states since 2007, is linked to syringes left unattended on carts.

headline.seo: Report Cites New Hampshire Hospital in Hepatitis C Outbreak
headline.main: Report Looks at Hospital in Outbreak of Hepatitis
headline.print_headline: Report Looks At Hospital In Outbreak Of Hepatitis
